body: Could you construct a tensor and then `push_back` it? Using `emplace_back` to add an element and then work with it inverts the logic.
body_html: Could you construct a tensor and then push_back it? Using emplace_back to add an element and then work with it inverts the logic.
body_text: Could you construct a tensor and then push_back it? Using emplace_back to add an element and then work with it inverts the logic.
